Connectivity issues: Participants may experience lag or other connectivity issues that can impact their performance in the tournament.
Space constraints: Participants may have limited space in their homes or offices, which could make it difficult to set up a proper gaming area.

Physical limitations: Some participants may have physical limitations that could make it difficult for them to participate in the tournament, such as motion sickness or difficulty using the controllers.
Time zone differences: Participants may be located in different time zones, which could make it difficult to schedule and coordinate the tournament.
Fairness and cheating: Ensuring that all participants are playing fairly and that there is no cheating or other unfair practices.
